about_the_game:
Welcome to Mini Mart! A mini sized shop and town sim.



Beginning with a rundown store and no money in the bank, a new burst of motivation stirs you to make something of yourself and your business.



What you'll be doing in mini mart:

In your store

  • Keep your store tidy and your shelves stocked with merchandise.
  • Tear down broken shelves and build new ones where you'd like.
  • Upgrade and customize your shop size, look, and efficiency.
  • Hire employees to automate shop tasks.

About town

  • The morning, day and night cycle gives you the freedom to choose how to spend your time.
  • Build relationships with townsfolk to unlock new merch, store upgrades, and staff.
  • Do activities to level up speed, strength and social stats.
  • Cook food, watch tv, or read a book at home.
